short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Reddit search results from Google as part of the X-it Reddit movement

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you make a search on google.com this extension hides any result from reddit.com so you cannot click on the result.

I built this because I was annoyed with getting search results from reddit.com and clicking on them and going to a private forum, since right now everyone is boycotting reddit.

Additionally I wanted to play around with chatGPT, this plugin was built by chatGPT
